classes.name: Bard
classes.desc: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.desc: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

classes.name: Druid
classes.desc: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature and adopting animal forms.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.desc: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.desc: A warrior who combats threats on the edges of civilization.

classes.name: Warlock
classes.desc: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.desc: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.desc: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality.
